data.content:
Kennen (Super Kennen)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

a costume that transforms the nimble ninja into a superhero. Released on November 29, 2011, this skin is available for purchase at a cost of 1350 RP.

The Super Kennen skin takes inspiration from classic superhero designs, with vibrant colors and a sleek costume. Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a yordle ninja who wields the power of lightning. With this skin, he embraces his heroic side, donning a red and blue suit complete with a cape and a lightning bolt emblem on his chest. The skin also features unique particle effects, such as lightning-themed abilities and a dynamic recall animation.

As a champion, Kennen possesses a unique set of abilities that make him a formidable force on the battlefield. He excels in team fights and has the potential to turn the tide of battle with his area-of-effect damage and crowd control. His passive ability, Mark of the Storm, allows him to stun enemies after applying a certain number of marks. This makes him a potent threat in both solo and team play.

Kennen's abilities synergize well with his Super Kennen skin, as the lightning-themed effects perfectly complement his electric powers. When using his Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, Kennen hurls a charged shuriken at his enemies, leaving a trail of lightning in its wake. His W ability, Electrical Surge, sends out a surge of electricity that damages and marks nearby enemies. The E ability, Lightning Rush, allows Kennen to dash through enemies, dealing damage and applying marks. Finally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, summons a storm of shurikens that damages and stuns all nearby enemies.

Now, let's delve into the lore of Kennen and his place in the world of League of Legends. Hailing from Bandle City, the yordle capital, Kennen is a member of the Kinkou Order, a group of ninja tasked with maintaining balance and order in the world. Trained by the legendary ninja master, Shen, Kennen has honed his skills in the art of lightning, becoming a formidable warrior.

In the game, Kennen is primarily played in the mid lane or as a support. His ability to harass opponents and control team fights makes him a valuable asset to any team composition. With his lightning-fast movements and powerful abilities, he can quickly burst down squishy targets and provide crowd control to turn the tide of battle.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Kennen's appearances, including the Super Kennen skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic ninja look or prefer the superhero aesthetic, Kennen offers a unique and exciting playstyle that is sure to electrify your League of Legends experience.

Kennen: The Heart of the Tempest

Release Date: February 21, 2010

League of Legends is a game filled with diverse and fascinating champions, each with their own unique abilities and stories. One such champion is Kennen, a lightning-fast ninja who has captured the hearts of players with his electrifying playstyle and charming personality. In this article, we will delve into the world of Kennen, exploring his background, strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game.

The Story of Kennen

Kennen hails from the land of Ionia, a realm known for its connection to spiritual energy and balance. Born into a small village, Kennen was different from the other inhabitants. He possessed an innate affinity for lightning, a power that both fascinated and frightened those around him. Despite his unique abilities, Kennen was determined to protect his village and its people.

As he grew older, Kennen sought guidance from the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to maintaining balance in Ionia. Under the tutelage of the Eye of Twilight, Shen, and the Fist of Shadow, Akali, Kennen honed his skills as a ninja. He learned to channel his lightning powers, using them to strike down his enemies with incredible speed and precision.

With his training complete, Kennen became a valued member of the Kinkou Order, joining his fellow ninjas in their mission to preserve harmony in Ionia. He became known as the Heart of the Tempest, a title that reflected both his lightning abilities and his unwavering dedication to justice.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Kennen's unique playstyle revolves around his lightning-based abilities, allowing him to excel in certain areas while also having vulnerabilities. Understanding his strengths and weaknesses is crucial for players looking to master this nimble ninja.

Strengths:

1. High Mobility: Kennen's lightning-fast movements make him incredibly agile, allowing him to quickly engage or disengage from fights. His Lightning Rush ability grants him a burst of speed, making it difficult for enemies to catch him.

2. AoE Damage: Kennen's abilities have the potential to deal damage to multiple enemies at once. His ultimate, Slicing Maelstrom, creates a storm of electricity that damages and stuns nearby foes, making him a formidable team fighter.

3. Energy Resource: Unlike many other champions who rely on mana or other resources, Kennen uses energy. This allows him to cast spells more frequently, granting him sustained damage output in prolonged engagements.

Weaknesses:

1. Squishy: Kennen is a relatively fragile champion, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Players must be mindful of their positioning and rely on their mobility to avoid taking unnecessary damage.

2. Ultimate Reliance: While Kennen's ultimate ability is incredibly powerful, it is also his primary source of team fight impact. Without it, his damage potential significantly decreases, making him vulnerable during its cooldown.

3. Short Range: Kennen's abilities require him to be in close proximity to his enemies, putting him at risk of being engaged upon by champions with longer-range abilities or crowd control.

Kennen's Place in the Game

Kennen has found his place in the game as a versatile champion who excels in team fights and skirmishes. His ability to quickly engage and stun multiple enemies with his ultimate can turn the tide of battles, making him a valuable asset to any team composition.

Due to his energy resource and high mobility, Kennen is often played in the top lane or mid lane, where he can utilize his lightning-based abilities to harass and outmaneuver his opponents. His ability to roam and assist other lanes also makes him a popular pick for players who enjoy making impactful plays across the map.

Furthermore, Kennen's unique playstyle and charming personality have made him a fan favorite among the League of Legends community. His adorable appearance, with his fluffy fur and oversized shuriken, has inspired a variety of creative skins that players can enjoy. On this page, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Kennen's skins, allowing you to choose the perfect look for this electrifying ninja.

In conclusion, Kennen is a champion who embodies the spirit of lightning and agility. With his lightning-based abilities, high mobility, and team fight potential, he has carved out a unique place in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his playstyle, or his adorable appearance, Kennen is a champion worth exploring and mastering.

Kennen (Default)

RP Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a lightning-fast yordle mage who harnesses the power of electricity to shock and stun his opponents. As one of the original champions in League of Legends, Kennen has become a fan favorite with his unique playstyle and versatile abilities. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Kennen's default costume and explore all the intricate details of his appearance.

The Story of Kennen's Default Costume

Kennen's default costume showcases his iconic yordle features and lightning-themed attire. He is depicted as a small, furry creature with large, pointy ears and a mischievous grin. His outfit consists of a blue and white tunic adorned with lightning bolt patterns, matching pants, and a pair of gloves that crackle with electric energy. To complete his look, Kennen wears a pair of boots designed for agility and swift movements.

The design of Kennen's default costume perfectly captures his essence as the Heart of the Tempest. The lightning bolt patterns on his tunic symbolize his mastery over electricity, while his gloves and boots reflect his nimble nature. The combination of blue and white colors adds a touch of elegance to his appearance, making him stand out on the battlefield.

Kennen's default costume is not only visually appealing but also serves as a representation of his lore and abilities. As a yordle mage, he draws power from the storm, channeling lightning through his body to unleash devastating attacks. His costume reflects this connection to electricity, emphasizing his role as a high-energy champion who excels in quick bursts of damage and crowd control.

Kennen's Story and Abilities

Kennen's story in League of Legends revolves around his quest to master his lightning-based abilities and prove himself as a formidable champion. Hailing from Bandle City, the home of the yordles, Kennen was chosen by the Kinkou Order to become one of their members. Under the guidance of the Eye of Twilight, Shen, and the Fist of Shadow, Akali, Kennen honed his skills and became a skilled ninja mage.

In the game, Kennen's abilities reflect his lightning-themed playstyle. His passive ability, Mark of the Storm, applies a mark to enemies, which can be triggered by his other abilities to stun opponents. His Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, allows him to throw a shuriken that damages and marks enemies. His W ability, Electrical Surge, releases a surge of electricity, damaging and applying marks to nearby enemies. His E ability, Lightning Rush, enables him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and applying marks. Finally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, summons a storm of shurikens that damages and stuns enemies within its radius.

Kennen's playstyle revolves around his ability to quickly engage and disengage from fights, utilizing his lightning-based abilities to control the battlefield. His passive stun, combined with his high mobility, makes him a potent threat in team fights and skirmishes. However, Kennen's squishy nature and reliance on his abilities for damage make him vulnerable if caught off-guard or silenced.

Despite his weaknesses, Kennen has found his place in the game as a versatile pick in both solo lanes and as a utility mage in team compositions. His ability to stun multiple enemies with his ultimate can turn the tide of team fights, while his lightning-based damage allows him to burst down squishy targets. With the right positioning and timing, Kennen can be a game-changer in the hands of a skilled player.

Explore Kennen's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Kennen's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. From the fiery Infernal Kennen to the adorable Super Kennen, there is a skin for every taste and playstyle. Discover the different looks and themes that Kennen has to offer and unleash the full potential of the Heart of the Tempest.

Kennen (Kennen M.D.)

Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2011

League of Legends is known for its diverse and imaginative skins, and one of the most iconic skins for the lightning-fast ninja, Kennen, is

This skin takes Kennen's abilities and appearance to a whole new level, transforming him into a medical professional ready to save lives on the Rift. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Kennen M.D., explore the details of the skin, and provide an overview of Kennen's strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game.

The Story of Kennen M.D.

Kennen M.D. is a skin that showcases Kennen's versatility and adaptability. In this alternate universe, Kennen has taken on the role of a medical doctor, using his lightning powers to heal and protect his allies. The skin features Kennen dressed in a white lab coat, complete with a stethoscope around his neck and a medical bag by his side. His shurikens are transformed into syringes, and his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, creates a swirling vortex of healing energy.

The concept behind Kennen M.D. is a playful twist on the traditional ninja archetype. Instead of using his lightning powers for combat, Kennen now uses them to provide medical aid to his team. This unique take on the character adds a touch of humor and charm to the skin, making it a favorite among players.

Details of the Skin

Kennen M.D. is a 1350 RP skin, which means it offers a significant visual and thematic overhaul for the champion. The skin features new animations, particle effects, and sound effects, all designed to enhance the experience of playing as Kennen M.D.

One of the standout features of the skin is the transformation of Kennen's abilities. His Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, now throws syringes instead of shurikens, injecting a dose of healing energy into his enemies. His W ability, Electrical Surge, creates a burst of healing electricity around him, providing sustain for himself and his allies. The E ability, Lightning Rush, turns Kennen into a streak of healing lightning, granting him increased movement speed and a shield to protect himself and his teammates. Finally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, creates a swirling vortex of healing energy, damaging enemies and healing allies caught within its radius.

Visually, Kennen M.D. stands out with his white lab coat, stethoscope, and medical bag. The attention to detail in the skin is impressive, with intricate stitching on the lab coat and a well-designed medical bag. The syringes that replace his shurikens are also a nice touch, adding to the overall theme of the skin.

Kennen's Story and Gameplay

Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a yordle ninja who hails from the Kinkou Order. Trained in the art of lightning, Kennen is a highly mobile and bursty champion, capable of dashing in and out of fights with ease. His kit revolves around his energy resource, allowing him to spam his abilities and stun enemies with his passive, Mark of the Storm.

In terms of gameplay, Kennen excels in team fights and skirmishes. His ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, can turn the tide of a battle, stunning multiple enemies and dealing significant damage. His Lightning Rush ability allows him to engage or disengage from fights, making him a slippery target to catch. Additionally, his Electrical Surge ability provides him with sustain and wave-clearing capabilities, making him a strong laner.

However, Kennen does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage. If his abilities are on cooldown or he runs out of energy, he becomes vulnerable and less impactful in fights. Additionally, his range is relatively short, requiring him to get up close and personal to deal damage, which can put him at risk against champions with longer ranges or crowd control abilities.

In the lore of League of Legends, Kennen is a member of the Kinkou Order, alongside champions like Shen and Akali. The Kinkou Order is dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in the world, and Kennen plays a crucial role in their mission. Despite his small stature, Kennen is a formidable warrior, using his lightning powers to protect the innocent and uphold justice.

Explore Kennen's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Kennen and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our website. From his classic ninja look to the electrifying Super Kennen skin, there are plenty of options to suit your playstyle and personal preferences.

Whether you choose to embrace the healing powers of Kennen M.D. or prefer his more traditional ninja persona, Kennen is a versatile and exciting champion to play. With his lightning-fast abilities and high burst damage, he can turn the tide of battles and make a significant impact on the game.

So, why wait? Dive into the world of Kennen and experience the thrill of playing as this lightning ninja today!

Kennen (DWG Kennen)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 1, 2020

Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a nimble and electrifying champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his lightning-fast movements and powerful electrical abilities, Kennen has become a fan-favorite among players. With the release of the DWG Kennen skin, players can now experience a new and exciting look for this electrifying hero.

The DWG Kennen skin was released on October 1, 2020, and is priced at 1350 RP. This skin is part of the DWG (Damwon Gaming) skin line, which celebrates the victory of the Korean team Damwon Gaming in the 2020 League of Legends World Championship. The skin features Kennen dressed in the team's colors, showcasing his support for the victorious team.

With the DWG Kennen skin, Kennen receives a complete visual overhaul, transforming him into a true representation of Damwon Gaming. His usual ninja attire is replaced with a sleek and modern outfit, featuring the team's colors of blue and white. The skin also includes new particle effects for his abilities, giving them a unique and electrifying look.

One of the standout features of the DWG Kennen skin is the recall animation. When recalling, Kennen summons a holographic trophy of the Summoner's Cup, the ultimate prize in the League of Legends World Championship. This animation not only showcases Kennen's support for Damwon Gaming but also adds an extra level of prestige to the skin.

Now, let's take a closer look at Kennen himself. In the world of League of Legends, Kennen is a yordle from Bandle City who harnesses the power of lightning. He is a highly mobile mage who excels at engaging and stunning enemies with his electrical abilities. Kennen's passive ability, Mark of the Storm, applies a stack of lightning to enemies hit by his abilities. When an enemy reaches three stacks, they are stunned, leaving them vulnerable to further attacks.

Kennen's Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, allows him to throw a shuriken that damages and applies a stack of lightning to the first enemy hit. His W ability, Electrical Surge, passively adds bonus damage to his basic attacks and activates to damage and apply a stack of lightning to all nearby enemies. Kennen's E ability, Lightning Rush, allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and applying a stack of lightning to each enemy hit. Finally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, summons a storm of shurikens that damages and stuns all enemies within its area of effect.

Kennen's playstyle revolves around his ability to quickly engage and stun enemies, making him a formidable champion in team fights. His lightning-based abilities allow him to deal significant damage to multiple enemies at once, making him a great choice for crowd control and area denial. However, Kennen's squishy nature and reliance on his abilities make him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage from enemy champions.

In the competitive scene, Kennen has seen his fair share of success. His ability to engage and stun multiple enemies has made him a popular pick in professional play, especially in team fight-oriented compositions. His versatility as both a top laner and a mid laner has also contributed to his popularity, allowing teams to flex him into different roles depending on the draft.

Overall, Kennen is a dynamic and electrifying champion in League of Legends. With his lightning-fast movements and powerful electrical abilities, he is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of his base appearance or the new DWG Kennen skin, you can find more information and videos about all of Kennen's appearances on this page.

Kennen (Astronaut Kennen)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 22, 2021

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Kennen, a yordle with a lightning-fast playstyle. With the release of the Astronaut Kennen skin, players can now experience the thrill of space exploration with this electrifying hero.

Astronaut Kennen is a visually stunning skin that transforms the yordle into an intergalactic explorer. Clad in a futuristic spacesuit, Kennen is ready to embark on an adventure beyond the stars. The skin features a sleek silver and blue color scheme, with glowing accents that give it a truly otherworldly feel. From his helmet to his boots, every detail of Astronaut Kennen's design exudes a sense of cosmic wonder.

One of the standout features of Astronaut Kennen is his ability animations. When casting his abilities, Kennen unleashes bursts of cosmic energy, crackling with electricity. His Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, becomes a spinning meteor that hurtles towards his enemies. The W ability, Electrical Surge, creates a dazzling display of sparks and lightning bolts. And when activating his ultimate, Slicing Maelstrom, Kennen summons a swirling vortex of stars that rains down upon his foes. These visually stunning effects truly bring the skin to life and make playing as Astronaut Kennen an immersive experience.

But what is the story behind Astronaut Kennen? How did this yordle find himself exploring the cosmos? While League of Legends does not provide an official lore for skin lines, we can imagine a narrative that fits the theme. In this imagined story, Kennen is a brilliant inventor from Bandle City who has always dreamed of exploring the unknown. When the opportunity arises to join a space exploration program, Kennen eagerly volunteers, using his intellect and lightning powers to become an invaluable member of the team. Equipped with his trusty spacesuit and a modified version of his shurikens, Kennen sets off on a journey through the stars, encountering strange new worlds and formidable extraterrestrial foes.

In terms of gameplay, Kennen is a versatile champion who excels in team fights and skirmishes. His passive ability, Mark of the Storm, allows him to stun enemies after applying a certain number of marks. This makes him a potent crowd control champion, capable of turning the tide of battle with a well-timed stun. Additionally, Kennen's abilities have a mix of damage and utility, making him a valuable asset in any team composition.

However, like any champion, Kennen also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, requires him to be in the midst of the enemy team to maximize its effectiveness, putting him at risk of being focused and taken down quickly. Players must be mindful of these weaknesses and play strategically to make the most of Kennen's strengths.

In the world of League of Legends, Kennen has made a name for himself as a formidable champion. With his lightning-fast attacks and crowd control abilities, he has become a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. His ability to initiate team fights and lock down priority targets makes him a valuable asset in any team composition. Whether played in the top lane or as a mid laner, Kennen's versatility and high impact make him a force to be reckoned with.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Kennen's appearances, including the Astronaut Kennen skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic ninja aesthetic or want to explore the cosmos with Astronaut Kennen, there's a skin for every taste. So, gear up and get ready to unleash the power of lightning with this electrifying yordle!

Kennen (Deadly Kennen)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2010

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and appearances. One such champion is Kennen, a lightning-fast ninja who excels in quick, high-damage engagements. With his lightning-themed abilities, Kennen has become a fan-favorite among players. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Kennen's

skin and explore all the intricate details of this electrifying costume.

The

skin was released on November 29, 2010, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This skin transforms Kennen into a fearsome ninja, clad in dark, sleek armor that exudes an aura of danger. The skin features a black and red color scheme, with glowing red eyes that add an extra touch of menace to his appearance. Deadly Kennen wields two electrified shurikens, crackling with energy, ready to strike down his enemies with lightning-fast precision.

One of the standout features of the Deadly Kennen skin is the visual effects it brings to Kennen's abilities. When using his Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, Deadly Kennen hurls a dark, electrified shuriken at his foes, leaving a trail of crackling energy in its wake. His W ability, Electrical Surge, emits a pulsating red aura, intensifying the feeling of impending danger. Additionally, his E ability, Lightning Rush, envelops him in a swirling vortex of dark energy, enhancing his agility and speed. Finally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, summons a storm of red lightning bolts that rain down upon his enemies, leaving them stunned and vulnerable.

Now that we have explored the details of the Deadly Kennen skin, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Kennen himself. In the world of League of Legends, Kennen hails from the land of Ionia, a realm known for its connection to spiritual energy and balance. As a member of the Kinkou Order, Kennen is tasked with maintaining harmony and order in Ionia, using his lightning-infused abilities to swiftly dispatch any threats that arise.

Kennen's strengths lie in his ability to quickly engage and burst down enemies. With his passive ability, Mark of the Storm, Kennen can apply a stack of electrical energy to his opponents with each ability cast. Once an enemy has three stacks, Kennen can activate his passive to stun them, leaving them vulnerable to further attacks. This makes him a formidable duelist and team fighter, capable of turning the tide of battle with a well-timed stun.

However, Kennen does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, meaning that he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high energy costs, requiring careful management to ensure he doesn't run out of resources in the heat of battle. Despite these weaknesses, in the hands of a skilled player, Kennen can be a force to be reckoned with.

In the world of League of Legends, Kennen has become a staple pick in the top lane and mid lane. His ability to harass opponents from a safe distance with his Q ability, combined with his ability to quickly engage and disengage fights with his E ability, makes him a versatile and potent champion. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, can turn the tide of team fights, stunning multiple enemies and allowing his team to secure crucial kills.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Kennen's appearances, including the Deadly Kennen skin. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies with the Deadly Kennen skin, Kennen offers a thrilling and electrifying gameplay experience.

Kennen (Karate Kennen)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2010

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

a martial arts-inspired costume for the lightning-fast ninja, Kennen. Released on November 29, 2010, this skin offers players a visually appealing and thematic alternative to Kennen's default appearance.

As the name suggests, Karate Kennen showcases the champion's mastery of martial arts, emphasizing his agility and lightning-based abilities. This skin transforms Kennen into a fierce and disciplined martial artist, complete with a traditional karate gi, black belt, and headband. The skin also features unique animations and visual effects that complement Kennen's lightning-themed abilities.

When playing as Karate Kennen, players will notice the striking visual changes to his abilities. His Q ability, Thundering Shuriken, now appears as a spinning, electrified karate chop, while his W ability, Electrical Surge, manifests as a burst of lightning emanating from his strikes. Additionally, his E ability, Lightning Rush, showcases Kennen dashing forward with lightning speed, leaving behind a trail of electrified footprints.

One of the most visually impressive aspects of Karate Kennen is his ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom. When activated, Kennen summons a storm of lightning that surrounds him, striking nearby enemies with bolts of electricity. This ability is enhanced by the skin's martial arts theme, as Kennen performs a series of acrobatic kicks and strikes while the storm rages around him.

Now that we've explored the details of Karate Kennen, let's delve into the story of the hero himself. Kennen is a yordle from Bandle City, a mystical and magical place inhabited by various fantastical creatures. Despite his small stature, Kennen possesses incredible speed and agility, making him a formidable opponent on the battlefield.

In the lore of League of Legends, Kennen is a member of the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in the world. Trained in the art of lightning magic and martial arts, Kennen serves as the Heart of the Tempest, using his lightning-based abilities to swiftly dispatch his enemies.

Kennen's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disengage quickly, making him an excellent assassin and disruptor. His lightning-based abilities allow him to deal significant damage to multiple enemies at once, making him a valuable asset in team fights. Additionally, his passive ability, Mark of the Storm, applies a debuff to enemies, stunning them after a certain number of hits, further enhancing his crowd control capabilities.

However, Kennen also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his abilities have high energy costs, requiring careful management to maximize his effectiveness in prolonged engagements.

In the world of League of Legends, Kennen has become a popular pick in both professional and casual play. His versatility and ability to impact team fights make him a valuable addition to any team composition. Whether played in the top lane, mid lane, or even as a support, Kennen's lightning-based abilities and swift movements make him a force to be reckoned with.

If you're interested in exploring more about Kennen and his various appearances, you can find additional information and videos on our dedicated page. From his classic skin to other unique and thematic costumes like Karate Kennen, there's a skin to suit every player's taste.

So, whether you're a fan of martial arts or simply enjoy playing as a lightning-fast ninja, Karate Kennen is a skin that offers both visual appeal and thematic immersion. Embrace the way of the warrior and unleash the power of lightning with this exciting skin for Kennen!

Kennen (Infernal Kennen)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 1, 2019

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Kennen, a yordle with a penchant for lightning and a mischievous personality. Over the years, Kennen has received various skins that allow players to customize his appearance in-game. One of these skins is the fearsome

Released on August 1, 2019, Infernal Kennen is a 1350 RP skin that transforms the lightning-wielding yordle into a fiery inferno. This skin offers a complete visual overhaul, including new animations, sound effects, and particle effects, to give players a fresh and exciting experience when playing as Kennen.

The Infernal Kennen skin features Kennen donning a fiery red and orange outfit, with flames emanating from his body. His shurikens are transformed into burning embers, and his lightning abilities are replaced with scorching flames. The skin also introduces new recall animations, where Kennen engulfs himself in flames before disappearing and reappearing in a burst of fire.

With the release of Infernal Kennen, players can now unleash the power of fire as they dominate the Rift. The skin not only provides a visually stunning experience but also adds a new layer of immersion to the game. Playing as Infernal Kennen allows players to feel the heat of battle as they unleash devastating fire-based attacks on their enemies.

Now, let's delve into the story of Kennen and his place in the League of Legends universe. Kennen is a yordle from Bandle City, known for his lightning-fast reflexes and mastery of electrical energy. Despite his small stature, Kennen is a formidable opponent on the battlefield, using his lightning-based abilities to stun and damage his enemies.

In the lore of League of Legends, Kennen is a member of the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in the world. Alongside his fellow members, Shen and Akali, Kennen works to protect the land from threats and restore order where chaos reigns.

Kennen's abilities revolve around his mastery of lightning. His passive ability,
allows his abilities to apply a mark to enemies, which can be triggered to stun them. His Q ability,
allows him to throw a shuriken that damages and marks enemies. His W ability,
releases a surge of electricity that damages and applies marks to nearby enemies. His E ability,
allows him to dash through enemies, dealing damage and applying marks. Finally, his ultimate ability,

summons a storm of shurikens that damages and stuns enemies within its area of effect.

Kennen's strengths lie in his ability to quickly burst down enemies and control team fights with his stuns. His lightning-based abilities make him a formidable opponent in the early game, allowing him to harass and zone his enemies effectively. Additionally, his mobility with his E ability makes him difficult to catch and escape from, giving him an advantage in skirmishes and team fights.

However, Kennen also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, making him vulnerable to burst damage and assassins. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high cooldowns, requiring careful management to maximize his effectiveness in fights. Finally, Kennen's reliance on landing his abilities to apply marks and stun enemies means that he can struggle against champions with high mobility or long-range poke.

In the world of League of Legends, Kennen has become a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. His ability to control team fights and provide utility to his team makes him a valuable asset in competitive matches. Additionally, his flashy playstyle and unique design have endeared him to players, making him a fan-favorite champion.

Kennen (Swamp Master Kennen)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2010

Swamp Master Kennen is a unique skin for the electrifying yordle ninja, Kennen. This skin transforms Kennen into a fearsome creature of the swamp, complete with a new look and animations. Released on November 29, 2010, this skin has become a favorite among Kennen enthusiasts, offering a fresh and exciting twist to the champion's appearance.

Swamp Master Kennen is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. With its distinctive design and captivating animations, this skin offers players a chance to experience Kennen in a whole new light.

Details of the Costume

Swamp Master Kennen takes the nimble ninja and gives him a dark and mysterious makeover. In this skin, Kennen is transformed into a creature of the swamp, with green scales covering his body and glowing yellow eyes. He wears a tattered cloak made of leaves and carries a staff adorned with swamp vegetation.

The skin also features unique animations that perfectly capture the essence of the swamp. Kennen's abilities are given a new visual flair, with his shurikens and lightning bolts taking on a green hue. His ultimate ability, Slicing Maelstrom, summons a swirling vortex of swamp energy, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Overall, Swamp Master Kennen is a visually stunning skin that offers players a chance to see their favorite ninja in a whole new light. Whether you're a fan of Kennen or simply looking for a unique and captivating skin, Swamp Master Kennen is sure to impress.

The Story of Kennen

Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a yordle ninja who hails from the distant land of Bandle City. Despite his small stature, Kennen possesses incredible agility and lightning-fast reflexes, making him a formidable opponent on the battlefield.

Little is known about Kennen's past, as he is a mysterious figure who prefers to keep to himself. However, it is believed that he was trained in the ancient art of the Kinkou Order, an organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in the world. As a member of the Kinkou, Kennen serves as a defender of the balance, using his lightning-based abilities to strike down those who threaten the natural order.

In the game, Kennen is classified as a mage and an assassin, excelling in both burst damage and crowd control. His abilities revolve around his lightning-based attacks, allowing him to quickly dash in and out of combat while dealing devastating damage to his enemies.

One of Kennen's key strengths is his ability to stun multiple enemies with his passive, Mark of the Storm. Each of Kennen's abilities applies a mark to his targets, and when an enemy reaches three marks, they are stunned, leaving them vulnerable to further attacks. This makes Kennen a powerful team fighter, as he can quickly disable multiple opponents and turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

However, Kennen also has his weaknesses. He is a squishy champion, meaning that he has low health and is susceptible to burst damage. This makes positioning and timing crucial for Kennen players, as they must carefully choose when to engage in combat and when to retreat. Additionally, Kennen relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage, so if his abilities are on cooldown, he becomes significantly less threatening.

In the world of League of Legends, Kennen has become a popular pick in both professional play and casual matches. His versatility and high skill ceiling make him a favorite among players who enjoy fast-paced and high-impact gameplay. Whether you're looking to dominate the mid lane or wreak havoc in team fights, Kennen is a champion that should not be underestimated.
